21735.「おお <pc>。来てくれたか。\n じつはな そちに 頼みがある。\n これが:
Ah, <pc>, it's you. There's a favor I
must ask of you. This will be my final
request...

21736.「余の最後の頼みとは……\n 我が祖国 ガテリア皇国を探す\n 手伝いをしてほし:
My last request...is for you to help me find
my homelandーthe Gateria Empire.

21737.「……みなまで申すな。\n ガテリアが すでに存在しないのは 重々承知。\n し:
Yes, I know... I'm well aware that it no
longer exists today. However...

21738.「ウルベア同様 朽ち果てた姿の……。\n そう。ガテリア皇国の 遺跡ならば\n:
It is in a state of ruin, much like Urbea...
Perhaps we can find it within the ruins?

21739.「余は 見てみたくなったのじゃ。\n かつて 父上や母上 そして……\n リウ老:
My homeland as it is nowーthe place I once
lived with my mother, my father, and Master
Liu... I wished to see it.

21740.「祖国の玉座の間には 親しい者たちがいた。\n 彼らの思い出に ふれることができ:
Within the throne room of my homeland is where those dear to me were. If I can just be reminded of that, then perhaps I can
find the way forward...

21741.「ウルベア地下遺跡のある場所から見て\n ガテリアの遺跡は この大陸の西の果てに:
From Urbea's ruins, the ruins of Gateria must
lie to the east of the Boronus Lava Flow,
on the continent's western edge.

21742.「<pc>よ。ガテリアの遺跡を見つけ\n 余を 玉座の間まで 連れていってたもれ:
Find the ruins of Gateria and lead me to the
throne room, <pc>. Would you please
grant me this final request?

21743.「そうか！ やってくれるか！\n 本当に…… 本当に\n そちに 出会えて よか:
So you'll really do it then?!
I...I am truly glad to have met you!

21744.「それでは ボロヌス溶岩流に行き\n ガテリアの遺跡を探すとしよう。\n 余は:
Let's make our way to the Boronus Lava Flow
to search for the ruins there. I will follow
behind you.

21746.「話を聞いてりゃ アンタ……。\n 身寄りが いねえみたいですなッ！: From what I hear, you don't got any family!

21747.「もし 行くあてがねえんなら\n 養子にでもしてやるでごぜえますよッ！\n ここ:
If you've got nowhere else to go, then I'll
just adopt you! Think of this place as your
new home!

21749.「カッ カン違いしねえでくだせえッ！\n わしは アンタの その…ガラクタの知識:
D-don't get the wrong idea!
I just value your... Your knowledge
of junk, that's all!

21750.「ダストン殿……。\n 見かけによらず 貴公は 優しいのであるな。\n その申し:
Mr. Duston... You are much kinder than you
appear to me. I am truly grateful for your
offer.

21751.「……じゃが 余は 行かねばならぬ。\n 祖国の今を 見届けねば 余の時間は\n:
...But I must go. If I don't see my country as
it is now, then I will forever feel stuck...

21752.「<pc>よ。それでは 参ろうか。\n 目指すは ボロヌス溶岩流の東に眠る\n:
Shall we go, then? We must find the ruins of
Gateria that lie to the east of the Boronus
Lava Flow.

21753.「……ムムッ！\n そちは 他の者の依頼を たくさん抱えており\n 余の頼みは:
Mwah! It seems you have too many requests from
others to accept my request.

21754.「まあ こちらは 一刻を争うわけでもない。\n 急ぎの依頼を 片付けたら\n 余:
Well, we're not in a time crunch. If you
finish your urgent request, you can help me
out.

21755.「……そうかえ。\n ならば いたしかたなし。\n そちの気が変わるまで 待つこ:
I see. Then so be it. I shall wait until you
change your mind.

21756.「おお <pc>。\n 余の祖国 ガテリア皇国の遺跡を探す\n 手伝いをしてくれ:
Oh <pc>. Are you willing to help me
find the ruins of my homeland, the Imperial
Kingdom of Gateria?

21757.「余は 見てみたくなったのじゃ。\n かつて 父上や母上 そして……\n リウ老:
I wanted to see. I wanted to see my homeland
as it is now, where I once lived with my
father, my mother and Master Liu.

21758.「祖国の玉座の間には 親しい者たちがいた。\n 彼らの思い出に ふれることができ:
There were those who were dear to me in the
throne room of my homeland. If I can touch
their memories, I can walk again.

21759.「ウルベア地下遺跡のある場所から見て\n ガテリアの遺跡は この大陸の西の果てに:
From the location of Urbea's ruins, the ruins
of Gateria must lie to the east of the Boronus
Boronus Lava Flow far to the west.

21760.「<pc>よ。ガテリアの遺跡を見つけ\n 余を 玉座の間まで 連れていってたもれ:
<pc>! Find the ruins of Gateria and
lead me to the Throne Room. Will you please
grant me this last request?

21761.「余の祖国 ガテリア皇国の遺跡は\n きっと この大陸の西の果てにある\n ボロ:
The ruins of my homeland, the Kingdom of
Gateria, must lie to the east of the Boronus
Lava Flow in the far west of this continent.

21762.「余と共に ボロヌス溶岩流に行き\n ガテリアの遺跡を見つけたら\n 奥の玉座の:
If you go with me to the Boronus Lava Flow and
find the ruins of Gateria, please take me to
the throne Room in the back.

21763.「祖国の玉座の間には 親しい者たちがいた。\n 彼らの思い出に ふれることができ:
There were those who were dear to me in the
throne room of my homeland. If I can touch
their memories, I can walk again.

21764.「これが 余の最後の頼みじゃ……。\n 頼んだぞよ <pc>。:
This is my last request... please do me a
favor, <pc>.

21765.「そちのおかげで ボロヌス溶岩流に眠る\n ガテリア皇国の遺跡は 見つかったぞよ:
Thanks to you, we have found the remains of
the Imperial Kingdom of Gateria lying in the
Boronus Lava Flow. It's truly a thrill.

21766.「あとは その奥にあるはずの\n 玉座の間まで 余を 連れていってたもれ。:
Then take me to the throne Room, which is
supposed to be behind the throne room.

21767.「祖国の玉座の間には 親しい者たちがいた。\n 彼らの思い出に ふれることができ:
There were those who were dear to me in the
throne room of my homeland. If I can touch
their memories, I can walk again.

21768.「これが 余の最後の頼みじゃ……。\n 頼んだぞよ <pc>。:
This is my last request... please do me a
favor, <pc>.

21769.「おお……！ ついに……\n ついに 見つけてくれたのじゃな……。\n <pc>:
Oh...! At last... at last... you have found
me...

21770.「かように 変わり果てても\n 悲しいほど 余には わかるぞえ……。: I know how sad it is to see you so changed...

21771.「まちがいない。\n この地こそ 我が祖国ガテリアじゃ……。:
I have no doubt. This is our homeland,
Gateria.

21772.「祖国といえど 父上も母上も……\n 親しい者は 皆 すでに ここにはおらぬ。\:
Even in my homeland, my father, mother, and
all those close to me are no longer here. I
knew it, but it's still hard...

21773.「……さあ <pc>。\n 余を 玉座の間まで 連れていってたもれ。\n きっと:
Come, <pc>. Take me to the Throne
Room. I'm sure it's in there.

21775.「この部屋こそ 余の思い出が詰まった\n ガテリア皇国の玉座の間……。\n つい:
This room, the throne room of the Imperial Palace of Gateria, where I have so many memories, is the place where I have finally
arrived.

21776.「……こうしていると 在りし日のガテリアが\n 目に 浮かぶようじゃ。: I can just picture Gateria in her glory days.

21777.「……父上が 威風堂々と玉座に座ると\n その隣で 母上が 余に笑いかけた。\n:
Father sat majestically on his throne, and
Mother sat next to him, smiling at me. And
then...

21778.「決まった時間になると リウ老師が\n 嬉しそうに 余を迎えにくる……。:
At the appointed time, Master Liu happily
comes to pick me up...

21781.「余が ここに来た 本当の理由は……: The real reason I'm here is...

21784.「ど どこから わいて 出おった！？\n かような お化けフンコロガシ……\n:
Where did you come from? There's never been a
ghostly dung beetle in my Gateria!

21785.「<cs_pchero> 頼むッ！！\n 神聖な玉座の間を汚す 不届き者の\n:
<cs_pchero> Please! Strike down the infidel
dung beetle that defiles the sacred Throne
Room!

21786.「よいか <cs_pchero>！\n あの お化けフンコロガシを見かけたら\n:
All right, <cs_pchero>! The next time you
see that ghostly dung beetle, you'll show me
what you're made of!

21788.「で 出たぁぁぁッ！！\n 頼んだぞよ <cs_pchero>！！: And it's out! I'm asking you, <cs_pchero>!

21789.「おお！ 不届きな お化けフンコロガシを\n 見事 成敗してくれたようじゃな！\:
Oh! I see you've successfully vanquished the
treacherous ghostly dung beetle! Well done,
<cs_pchero>!

21790.「……かような化け物が すみつくとは\n 本当に ガテリアは 時代から\n 見捨:
Gateria has truly been abandoned by the times,
that such a monster should linger here.

21791.「……<cs_pchero>よ。\n 今こそ 余が ここへ来た\n 本当の理由を:
<cs_pchero>. Now is the time to tell you the
real reason I came here.

21792.「余は……\n ここで 自らの生を 終えようと思う。: I think... this is where I will end my life.

21793.「止めないでたもれ……！\n 大事な者たちとの思い出に ふれながら\n この世を:
Don't stop me. If I can leave this world with
the memories of those I cherish, then that's
what I want.

21794.「そちには 本当に世話になった。\n 心の底から 感謝してるぞよ。\n では さ:
I am truly indebted to you. I thank you from
the bottom of my heart. Now, farewell...

21797.「魔神兵……！？\n なぜ あの魔神兵が ガテリアにおる！？:
A Demon God Soldier...! Why is that Demon God
Soldier in Gateria?

21798.「まさか リウ老師か！？\n この中に リウ老師が入っておるのか！？\n 早く…:
It can't be! Master Liu? Is Master Liu in
here? Quickly... quickly, show me what's
inside!

21801.「ふふふ……。やはり……な。\n 魔神兵の中は もぬけのカラ……。\n もう リ:
Hmmm... as I thought... The inside of the
Demon God Soldier is empty... Master Liu is no
longer in this world.

21802.「……これは リウ老師の手紙か！？\n 老師が 余に 手紙を……！:
Is this Master Liu's letter? Master Liu wrote
to me!

21803.「……親愛なる我が主 ビャン・ダオさま。\n リウにございます。: ...Dear Lord Byan Dao. My name is Liu.

21804.「……ビャン皇子を魔神兵に乗せた後\n 私は このガテリアまで 戻ってまいりまし:
After I took Prince Byan on board the Demon
Soldier, I came back here to Gateria. To keep
my promise to meet Prince Byan in the future.

21805.「……しかし 私は 魔神兵に乗れなかった。\n 皇子の後を追って 未来へ行くとい:
...But I couldn't ride the Demon Soldier. I
couldn't choose the path of following the
Prince into the future...

21806.「私は 文明に影を落とした 技術者のひとり。\n その大いなる罪を つぐなうべく:
I am one of those engineers who cast a shadow over civilization. I have decided to end my life in this age to atone for that great
crime...

21807.「……皇子の生きる未来に\n 正しい文明の姿を 取り戻すため\n この身を賭して:
I have decided to fight with all my might to
restore civilization to its rightful place in
the future of the prince's life.

21809.「ドワーフたちが 同じ過ちを繰り返したとき\n あなたならば きっと 正しき道へ:
When the Dwarves make the same mistake again,
you will be able to lead your people to the
right path...

21811.「……ビャンさま。あなたが 成人したら\n とっておきの技術を 教えるという約束:
Master Byan. Do you remember my promise to
teach you a very special skill when you come
of age?

21812.「今こそ その約束を果たすとき……。\n さあ 魔神兵の中に入っているモノを\n:
Now is the time to fulfill that promise...
Now, please accept what is inside the Demon
Soldier.

21814.「……かつて ドワーフたちは\n 他の種族と同じく 自らの手で タネを植え\n:
In the past, Dwarves, like other species,
planted their own seeds and rejoiced in the
harvest.

21815.「……しかし 我らは 高度な技術におぼれ\n 自らのチカラで 成しとげる よろこ:
However, we have become so addicted to advanced technology that we have lost sight of the joys of accomplishing things with our own
strength, of what true civilization is all about.

21816.「私が ビャンさまに託したかった技術とは……\n 自らのチカラで 生き抜く術だっ:
The skill I wanted to entrust to Mr. Byan was
the art of surviving on one's own strength.

21817.「ビャンさま…… どうか お元気で……。\n あなたとの約束を守れなかった\n:
Master Byan please be well and forgive me for
not being able to keep my promise to you.

21818.「老師……。そなたは 何も わかっておらぬ。\n 余が欲しかったのは こんな手紙:
Master you understand nothing. What I wanted
was not a letter like this, not a letter like
this.

21819.「リウ老師……。余は ただ 一目だけでも\n そなたに 会いたかったのじゃ……。:
Master Liu I just wanted to meet you even if
it was only for one glance.

21820.「……だが その思いは 受け取ったぞ。\n リウ老師よ……。:
But I have received your thoughts. Master
Liu...

21821.「……そなたは 望んでおったのだな。\n 技術に身をまかせた ゆがんだ時代を終わ:
You have longed for this. You wanted to end the warped age of technology and for the world to become exactly what it is today,
. I take that back. I have decided to live in this time. I wanted to see it. I could not have understood Master Liu's
teachings just by reading this letter. But now I understand... because you and Chiri have taught me the importance of living by our own
strength and not relying only on technology. You and Chili taught me the importance of living by our own strength...

21826.「<cs_pchero>。そちには 本当に世話になった。\n 感謝しても しきれ:
<cs_pchero>. I am truly indebted to you. I
can't thank you enough, but this is the least
I can do. Please accept this.

21827.「……余は これから リウ老師の教えに従い\n 旅に出ようと思う。この手で タネ:
I will now embark on a journey following Master Liu's teachings. With my hands, I will plant seeds, and with my feet, I will find my
place.

21828.「ふふふ……。そちたちのおかげで\n 止まっていた余の時間が 動きだしたようじゃ:
Well... it seems that thanks to you, my time
to Move has come to a standstill. I'm so
excited to meet new people!

21829.「それでは また会おう！ <cs_pchero>よ！\n ガラクタ城の皆にも よ:
Well then, I'll see you again! <cs_pchero>!
Tell everyone at Junk Castle I said hi!
